remarks: Reparametrization lemma.  The reparametrization of a path by any continuous map ` G : II --> II ` with ` G ( 0 ) = 0 ` and ` G ( 1 ) = 1 ` is path-homotopic to the original path.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
reparpht.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
reparpht.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( II Cn II ) ) $.
reparpht.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( G ` 0 ) = 0 ) $.
reparpht.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( G ` 1 ) = 1 ) $.
reparpht $p |- ( ph -> ( F o. G ) ( ~=ph ` J ) F ) $.
